data: 爷爷留给我的这家破旧的[color=lightgreen]古玩店[/color]似乎经营不下去了…我并没有[color=lightblue]商业[/color]才能，更没有搜罗古玩异宝的手段。
The dilapidated antique shop left to me by my grandfather seems unable to operate... I don't have business talent, nor do I have the means to search for antique treasures.
再卖不出去东西的话，我饭都要吃不起了T.T……哎，还是趁早关门，找个上班吧……
If I can't sell anything anymore, I won't even be able to afford food. T.T... Alas, it's better to close down early and find a job...
这可恶的死老头子，还说什么留给我了[color=yellow]惊世的宝藏[/color]！但看看这些剩下的都是些什么破铜烂铁，怎么可能会有顾客上门……
This damn old man. He said he left me a stunning treasure. But look at what's left. They are all just some junk. How could there be customers coming?
Don't speak ill of the master!
（环顾四周，并没有人。但在货架边阴暗的角落里，竟有一道光从一本古老的书籍上散发出来！）
(Looking around, there is no one. But in the dark corner by the shelf, there is actually a light emanating from an ancient book!)
（惊异间，强烈光芒迸发四射！再次睁开眼时，一个长相呆萌、衣着奇异的女孩出现在眼前！）
(In surprise, a strong light bursts out! When you open your eyes again, a cute-looking girl with strange clothes appears in front of you!)
Ah!! Seeing a ghost! (Turn around and run.)
（砰！一股看不见的气劲将你弹回原地！）
(Bang! An invisible force bounces you back to the same spot!)
你不用怕我！我就是你爷爷留给你的[color=yellow]宝藏[/color]！我受你爷爷命令，一直在此等候你。
You don't have to be afraid of me! I am the treasure your grandfather left you! I have been waiting for you here on your grandfather's orders.
（惊恐间，安抚了自己的情绪，开始打量起眼前人）你就是[color=yellow]宝藏[/color]？老爷子，我错怪了你了！
(In panic, you calm down your emotions and start to look at the person in front of you.) You are the treasure? Grandpa, wuwuwu, I was wrong about you.
没关系，从今天起你的人生将发生彻底改变。你会重走主人的路，成为[color=yellow]诸天万界之尊[/color]。届时，你意志就是世间的规则，你想怎么样都行。

It doesn't matter. From today on, your life will completely change. You will follow in the master's footsteps and become the lord of all realms. At that time, your will is the rule of the world, and you can do whatever you want.
你怎么和老爷子一样爱吹牛？你到底是谁？和我老爷子什么关系？
Why are you as boastful as grandpa? Who are you? What's your relationship with my grandpa?

我是[color=yellow]书之灵[/color]。是这本[color=yellow]《诸天宝录》[/color]幻化而成。我亦记载世间万界事物，亦可让宿主[color=lightblue]穿越万界[/color]、[color=lightblue]强化天资[/color]、甚至[color=lightblue]逆天改命[/color]。你爷爷已经不需要我了，他将我留给了你，从今天起，你就是我的主人。

I am the spirit of books. Transformed from this "Multiverse book". I also record all things in the worlds. I can also let the host travel through all realms, strengthen natural talents, and even change fate against the heavens. Your grandfather doesn't need me anymore. He left me to you. From today on, you are my master.
（一脸懵逼，没有听懂的样子）主人？穿越？系统？……我现在没有别的想法，就想把这古玩店经营下去，赚大把的[color=lightgreen]现金[/color]！成为CEO，走上人生巅峰！这你能帮我吗？

(Looking confused, not understanding.) Master? Travel? System?... I don't have any other thoughts now. I just want to run this antique shop, earn a lot of cash! Become a CEO, go to the top of life! Can you help me with that?
你果然异于常人。这古玩店当初只是你爷爷为行事方便的掩饰据点。但凡知晓我能力的人，无一不是想快速成长，征服万界。而你居然是想要[color=lightgreen]搞钱[/color]……

You are indeed different from ordinary people. This antique shop was just a cover base for your grandfather to act conveniently. For anyone who knows my ability, all of them want to grow quickly and conquer all realms. And you actually want to make money...
虽然是一个奇怪的主人，但既然是你的要求，我都会满足你。跟我来吧！
Although you are a strange master, since it is your request, I will satisfy you. Follow me!
（话闭！自称书之灵的女子消失在了眼前！脑海里却传来了她的声音…）
(After speaking! The woman who claims to be the spirit of books disappears in front of you! But her voice comes from your mind...)
到外面来，我将传授你[color]穿越万界[/color]之法！
Come outside. I will teach you the method of traveling through all realms!
看来不由得我不信了。等我~！
It seems I have to believe it. Wait for me!
（热闹繁华的都市中，你走在路旁。似乎周围的人群并不能看到漂浮在你身旁的书之灵…）
(In the bustling city, you are walking by the roadside. It seems that the people around you can't see the spirit of books floating beside you.)
这是你生活的[color=lightgreen]城市[/color]。但你的世界在我眼里，只是亿万位面之一。对你来讲，这里就是你的[color=yellow]主位面[/color]。要穿越到其他位面，必须以你的主位面为跳板。

This is the city where you live. But in my eyes, your world is just one of billions of planes. For you, this is your main plane. To travel to other planes, you must use your main plane as a springboard.
为什么我要穿越到其他位面去？
Why do I have to travel to other planes?

因为万界有各种稀有[color=lightblue]宝物[/color]、[color=lightblue]装备[/color]、甚至[color=lightblue]生物[/color]。你爷爷古玩店以前的古董，都是从某些[color=lightgreen]历史位面[/color]里淘（抢）来的！越是不可思议的世界，里面出现的物品就越是值钱！将这些[color=yellow]宝物带回来[/color]，[color=yellow]放在古玩店中售卖[/color]，自然有人愿意花钱！

Because there are all kinds of rare treasures, equipment, and even creatures in all realms. The antiques in your grandfather's antique shop were all obtained from certain historical planes! The more incredible the world, the more valuable the items that appear in it! Bring these treasures back and sell them in the antique shop, and naturally someone will be willing to pay for them!

而[color=yellow]《诸天宝录》[/color]将赋予你穿越万界的能力。这包括真实的[color=lightgreen]历史[/color]时期、书本中的刀剑[color=yellow]江湖[/color]、平行的[color=lightblue]未来[/color]世界，亦有东方文化中的[color=Aqua]修仙[/color]、[color=Aqua]玄幻[/color]，西方故事里的[color=orange]魔幻[/color]、[color=red]神话[/color]，甚至是[color=deeppink]异次元[/color]。

And the "Multiverse book" will give you the ability to travel through all realms. This includes real historical periods, the swordsmanship world in books, parallel future worlds, as well as cultivation and fantasy in Eastern culture, magic and mythology in Western stories, and even different dimensions.
奥！你说的虽然很有道理，但是我的狗命也很重要。你确定我过去能捡到宝物，然后安全的回来？
Oh! Although what you said makes sense, my life is also very important. Are you sure I can pick up treasures in the past and come back safely?

是的，你目前只是一个普通人类，实力过于弱小。你需要从简单的位面开始历练，[color=lightgreen]搜集装备[/color]、[color=lightgreen]招募伙伴[/color]、[color=lightgreen]学习技能[/color]，以强化自身！等你拥有强大的实力后，通过[color=lightblue]激活《诸天宝录》的力量[/color]，就能[color=lightblue]解锁更高强度的位面[/color]！

Yes, you are currently just an ordinary human being and your strength is too weak. You need to start your journey from a simple plane, collect equipment, recruit partners, and learn skills to strengthen yourself! When you have strong strength, by activating the power of the "Multiverse book", you can unlock planes of higher intensity!
我问的是怎样才能保住狗命……哎，算了。我现在该怎么做？
What I asked is how to save my life... Alas, forget it. What should I do now?
在人类文明中，中国历史上的[color=yellow]东汉三国[/color]鼎立时期，应该是你熟知的故事。这段时期，人类依然保持着最基础的[color=lightblue]冷兵器物理战斗[/color]。对你来讲，应该是最容易存活的世界。

In human civilization, the period of the tripartite confrontation of the Eastern Han and Three Kingdoms in Chinese history should be a story you are familiar with. During this period, humans still maintained the most basic cold weapon physical combat. For you, it should be the easiest world to survive in.
冷兵器？刀、枪、剑、戟，你没搞错吧。我只是一个手无缚鸡之力的普通人。
Cold weapons? Swords, spears, swords, halberds. Are you kidding me? I am just an ordinary person without the strength to truss a chicken.
（书之灵邪魅一笑，并没有继续回答你。而是渐渐漂浮，在空中吟唱起来…）
(The spirit of books gave an evil smile and didn't answer you anymore. Instead, she gradually floated up and began to chant in the air...)
屏气凝神，寻找心中穿越的漩涡！在混沌气息中，我将指引你进入汉末的三国世界！也不必担心，我自有[color=lightblue]保护你安全的手段[/color]。

Hold your breath and concentrate, look for the vortex of time travel in your heart! In the chaotic atmosphere, I will guide you into the world of the Three Kingdoms at the end of the Han Dynasty! Don't worry, I have my own means to protect your safety.
（点击右上角[color=lightblue]蓝色穿越漩涡按钮[/color]，进入[color=yellow]穿越系统[/color]后，选择进入[color=lightgreen]东汉三国[/color]位面。）
(Click the blue time travel vortex button in the upper right corner. After entering the time travel system, choose to enter the plane of the Eastern Han and Three Kingdoms.)
现在回古玩店也没有货品可卖，还是先按书之灵的建议前往[color=lightgreen]东汉三国[/color]世界看看吧！
Now there are no goods to sell when I go back to the antique shop. Let's first follow the suggestion of the spirit of books and go to the world of the Eastern Han and Three Kingdoms to have a look!
这就穿过来啦，是不是有点过于草率了？
Is it a bit too hasty to come here like this?
[color=yellow]《诸天宝录》[/color]赋予你的穿越能力，并没有想象中的复杂。你可以[color=lightgreen]随时在异位面与主位面之间穿梭[/color]。简单，没有规则限制，不就是最快乐的事吗？

The time travel ability given to you by the "Multiverse book" is not as complicated as imagined. You can travel between different planes and the main plane at any time. Isn't simplicity and no rule restrictions the happiest thing?
那宝物和装备呢？我该如何找到他们？
What about treasures and equipment? How can I find them?
每个位面世界的大地图上有着不同的地点。这些地点包括[color=lightgreen]主要城镇[/color]、[color=yellow]战斗场景[/color]、[color=lightblue]势力据点[/color]等。随着你的探索之路，不断的解开迷雾，找到所有的地点。

There are different locations on the big map of each plane world. These locations include major towns, battle scenes, power strongholds, etc. Along your exploration path, continuously uncover the fog and find all locations. Ordinary equipment can be dropped by defeating ordinary enemies in battle scenes. And rare equipment and treasures need to be discovered by your own exploration.
普通的装备可以在[color=yellow]战斗场景[/color]消灭普通敌人掉落。而稀有的装备与宝物需要你自己[color=lightblue]探索[/color]发现。
Ordinary equipment can be dropped by defeating ordinary enemies in battle scenes. And rare equipment and treasures need to be discovered by your own exploration.
你说的保护我的手段呢？嘿嘿！是[color=yellow]强大功法[/color]？还是[color=yellow]守护灵兽[/color]？或者[color=yellow]绝世神兵[/color]？
What about the means to protect me that you mentioned? Hehe! Is it a powerful skill? Or a guardian spirit beast? Or a peerless divine weapon?
你说的这些，以后你都会得到。但是现在呢，嘿嘿，这个你拿去！（从背后拿出一个盒子）
You will get all these things you mentioned later. But now, hehe, take this! (Take out a box from behind.)
获得了[color=yellow]一把无限子弹的沙漠之鹰手枪[/color]！
Obtained a Desert Eagle pistol with unlimited bullets!
（你迫不及待地将盒子打开……）什么！一把手枪？沙漠之鹰！
(You can't wait to open the box...) What! A pistol? Desert Eagle!
一把[color=yellow]无限子弹的手枪[/color]，对高级位面来讲，它虽然不算强大，但是对于[color=lightblue]冷兵器[/color]世界来说，已足够你保护自身了！
A pistol with unlimited bullets. Although it is not very powerful for advanced planes, for the cold weapon world, it is enough for you to protect yourself!
你先试着，将它[color=yellow]装备在身上[/color]…
First, try to equip it on yourself...
（点击右上[color=lightblue]角色按钮[/color]，在[color=lightgreen]物品栏[/color]中找到[color=yellow]沙漠之鹰[/color]，将它装备在自身上。)
(Click the character button in the upper right corner. Find the Desert Eagle in the item bar and equip it on yourself.)
现在还不能空手而回！根据书之灵[color=yellow]（引导任务）[/color]的提示进行吧！
Now you can't go back empty-handed! Follow the prompts of the spirit of books (guidance task)!
（[color=lightgreen]物品栏[/color]中找到[color=yellow]沙漠之鹰[/color]，双击或点击装备，将它穿戴在自身上。)
(Find the Desert Eagle in the item bar. Double-click or click to equip it and wear it on yourself.)
[color=yellow]发现了新地点！已发现位面全部地点，迷雾退散！
New location discovered! All locations in the plane have been discovered, and the fog dissipates!
看来你已经准备好开始[color=yellow]刷宝[/color]之旅了！
It seems that you are ready to start the treasure hunting journey!
天命打工人，一切向钱看。
A fated worker, always looking for money.
先从三国位面的第一个战斗副本[color=yellow]黄巾起义[/color]开始吧！试着将副本层数推进至[color=yellow]第三层[/color]以上，这是最初的考验！
Let's start with the first battle instance in the Three Kingdoms plane, instance 1! Try to push the number of instance levels to above the third level. This is the initial test!
点击此处[color=yellow]加快战斗速度[/color]
Click here to speed up the battle.
点击此处[color=yellow]开启自动战斗[/color]（优先使用技能预设顺序）
Click here to start automatic battle (preferentially use the preset skill sequence).
点击此处[color=yellow]开启循环战斗[/color]（通关或失败后自动重开）
Click here to start looped battle (automatically restart after passing or failing).
怎么敌人越来越多了！不行！这样下去要跪……
Why are there more and more enemies? No! If this continues, I will fail...
是的。随着[color=lightgblue]副本层数[/color]的上升，敌人实力与数量都提升了。俗话说，双拳难敌四手，你需要找到[color=yellow]队友[/color]和你一起冒险。

Yes. As the number of instance levels increases, the strength and number of enemies also increase. As the saying goes, two fists are no match for four hands. You need to find teammates to adventure with you.
每个位面世界都有很多可招募到的人物。你可以在[color=lightgblue]位面主城[/color]或者[color=lightgblue]势力据点[/color]中找到他们。先去三国世界的位面主城[color=yellow]洛阳[/color]的[color=yellow]酒馆[/color]看看吧！

There are many recruitable characters in every plane world. You can find them in the main city of the plane or in power strongholds. Let's first go to the tavern in Luoyang, the main city of the Three Kingdoms world plane.
点击此处[color=yellow]退出战斗[/color]，[color=yellow]前往洛阳酒馆[/color]！
Click here to exit the battle and go to the Luoyang tavern!
有人吗？听说这里有可以[color=lightgreen]招募[/color]保镖。有人愿意加入吗？待遇丰厚啊！
Is anyone there? I heard that here you can recruit bodyguards. Is anyone willing to join? The treatment is generous!
（一个陌生壮汉快步前向）少侠！你看看我怎么样？[color=lightblue]护卫[/color]职业，专业保镖！
(A strange strong man steps forward quickly.) Young hero! What do you think of me? Profession of guard, professional bodyguard!
（打量上下）看阁下身材魁梧、气宇轩昂，不知尊姓大名？
(Looking up and down.) Looking at you, you are burly and imposing. May I ask your name?
在下零陵[color=yellow]邢道荣[/color]！人称世间第一猛将！
I am Xing Daorong from Lingling! Known as the number one mighty general in the world!
[color=lightblue]零陵上将[/color]，久仰大名……额，还有其他人吗？
General of Lingling, I have long heard of your great name... Well, are there any others?
正所谓良禽择木而栖，在这英雄辈出的乱世，要想英雄心甘情愿的跟随你，需要你在这里的[color=yellow]声望评价[/color]达到他不同的要求！而我！哼，没有任何要求。你只需要帮我结清我欠酒馆的[color=lightgreen]100块赊账[/color]就行了。

As the saying goes, a good bird chooses a good tree to perch on. In this chaotic world where heroes emerge in large numbers, if you want heroes to follow you willingly, your reputation evaluation here needs to meet his different requirements! And as for me! Humph, I have no requirements. You just need to help me pay off the 100 yuan I owe on credit at the tavern.
上将军果然名不虚传。你开出的条件很有性价比。那就决定是你了！
General, as expected, your reputation is well-deserved. The condition you offered is very cost-effective. Then it's decided. It's you!
主公英明！还请主公亲自去[color=lightblue]酒馆掌柜[/color]那里，结清我的欠账，他们就能放我走了。
My lord is wise! Please go to the tavern keeper in person and pay off my debt. Then they will let me go.
点击此处打开[color=yellow]招募角色[/color]界面，招募[color=yellow]邢道荣[/color]为队友
Click here to open the recruitment character interface and recruit Xing Daorong as a teammate.
My lord, I am willing to serve you with all my heart!
望你能不辱上将之名，护我周全。
I hope you can live up to the name of the general and protect me.
恕在下直言，虽我武艺精湛、无人能挡，但在这乱世，人人都得有[color=lightblue]技能[/color]傍身才能得万无一失。主公，可以在洛阳[color=yellow]武馆[/color]学习一下基础的武艺，这样我压力也要小一些…

Forgive me for being outspoken. Although I am highly skilled in martial arts and unrivaled, in this chaotic world, everyone must have skills to protect themselves to be completely safe. My lord, you can learn some basic martial arts at the martial hall in Luoyang. This way, my pressure will be a little less...
说得倒是有些道理。但是不知道学起来难不难，是否费时？
What you said makes some sense. But I don't know if it's difficult to learn and whether it takes time?
学习[color=lightblue]战斗技能[/color]有两种方式。首先，可以在[color=lightblue]武馆[/color]或其他教授技艺的场所花费资源学习。只要有足够的[color=lightgreen]货币[/color]或者[color=lightgreen]贡献[/color]，以及足够的[color=lightblue]技能点（SP）[/color]就能够立刻学会。

There are two ways to learn combat skills. First, you can spend resources to learn at a martial arts school or other places that teach skills. As long as you have enough currency or contribution and enough skill points (SP), you can learn immediately.
其次，如果获得了某种技能的[color=yellow]秘籍[/color]，将秘籍装备给角色，就能逐步修炼该技能。其本质上，还是消耗了战斗获得的技能点。但是可以节约大笔的学习的费用。

Secondly, if you obtain the secret manual of a certain skill and equip the secret manual to the character, you can gradually practice this skill. In essence, it still consumes the skill points obtained from battles. But it can save a large amount of learning expenses.
学会技能，战斗效率应该就会提高许多。我现在就去[color=yellow]武馆[/color]看看。
Learning skills should improve combat efficiency a lot. I will go to the martial hall now.
[color=yellow]阵型编组[/color]系统已解锁！可点击此处[color=yellow]设置战斗阵位[/color]。
The formation system has been unlocked! You can click here to set the battle position.
记得在[color=yellow]编组[/color]系统中，将[color=yellow]邢道荣设置上阵[/color]！这样他就能参加后续的战斗了！
Remember to set Xing Daorong to enter the battle in the grouping system! So he can participate in subsequent battles!
再次强调，学习技能会消耗[color=lightblue]技能点SP[/color]与[color=lightgreen]货币[/color]。技能点可以通过角色[color=yellow]战斗积累[/color]，货币除了战斗能够获得外，还有其他途径也能获得。

Once again, learning skills will consume skill points SP and currency. Skill points can be accumulated through character battles. In addition to obtaining currency through battles, there are other ways to obtain it.
[color=lightblue]技能[/color]不光能在战斗中使用，随着[color=lightblue]技能等级[/color]的提升，也会有[color=yellow]被动属性[/color]加成。同时，学习不同技能类型，能够增加对应技能类型的[color=yellow]专精造诣[/color]，从而提高该种类型技能的威力与效果。这个你可以慢慢研究。

Skills can not only be used in battles. As the skill level increases, there will also be passive attribute bonuses. At the same time, learning different skill types can increase the specialization proficiency of the corresponding skill type, thereby improving the power and effect of this type of skill. You can study this slowly.
所以，除了装备之外，技能也是角色变强大的核心成长点。你需要多花些时间来研究它。
So, in addition to equipment, skills are also the core growth point for characters to become stronger. You need to spend more time researching it.
明白了！不断的[color=lightblue]更换更好的装备[/color]、不断的[color=lightblue]修炼更强的技能[/color]！这就是穿越位面存活与变强的基本方式！
Understood! Continuously changing to better equipment and continuously cultivating stronger skills! This is the basic way to survive and become stronger through different planes!
那么，我们返回东汉三国世界的大地图，继续开始战斗吧。这次的目标是[color=yellow]通关黄巾起义副本[/color]。需要注意，在使用[color=yellow]自动战斗[/color]模式前，请前往[color=lightblue]角色-技能[/color]界面，[color=yellow]设置自动释放技能的优先顺序[/color]。这样就能在战斗时自动释放技能了！

Then, let's return to the big map of the Eastern Han and Three Kingdoms world and continue to start the battle. The goal this time is to clear instance 1. Note that before using the automatic battle mode, please go to the character-skill interface and set the priority order for automatically releasing skills. This way, skills can be automatically released during battles!
敌羞，吾去脱他衣！拿下，主公！
Enemy is defeated! I will strip him! Done, my lord!
干得漂亮！终于第一次通关了副本！
Well done! Finally cleared the instance for the first time!
这仅仅是一个开始！如你所见，副本掉落得是随机的。想要获得稀有的装备，你得多次重复进行副本战斗。这就是[color=yellow]“刷”[/color]的含义！你可以通过设置[color=lightgreen]自动战斗[/color]，让刷变得轻松与快速。只有挑战[color=yellow]高难度敌人[/color]时，进行[color=yellow]手动[/color]挑战。这是一个明智之举。

This is just the beginning! As you can see, the drops in instances are random. To obtain rare equipment, you have to repeat instance battles many times. This is the meaning of "grinding"! You can make grinding easier and faster by setting up automatic battles. Only when challenging high-difficulty enemies should you challenge manually. This is a wise move.

另外，除了副本战斗外，还可以通过[color=lightgreen]购买[/color]与[color=lightblue]锻造[/color]获得装备。购买只需要[color=lightgreen]银两[/color]，而锻造需要[color=yellow]配方[/color]与[color=lightblue]材料[/color]。你可以前往洛阳的[color=yellow]商会[/color]与[color=yellow]铁匠铺[/color]分别了解一下！

In addition, in addition to instance battles, you can also obtain equipment through purchasing and forging. Purchasing only requires silver, while forging requires recipes and materials. You can go to the Chamber of Commerce and Blacksmith Shop in Luoyang to learn about them respectively!
装备的[color=lightblue]物品等级[/color]，和衡量装备强弱的一个标志。无论通过何种方式，将你的[color=lightgreen]平均装备物品等级[/color]提升至3.5级以上。你可以在[color=yellow]装备栏[/color]查看到它。
The item level of equipment is a sign to measure the strength of equipment. No matter in what way, raise your average item level of equipment to above 3.5. You can view it in the equipment bar.
现在你可以[color=yellow]挑战更高难度的副本[/color]了！
Now you can challenge more difficult instances!
我已渐渐上路了。刷装备、穿装备、学技能…
I am gradually getting on the right track. Grinding equipment, equipping equipment, learning skills...
除了装备、技能外，你还需要注意其他可以让你成长的系统。比如[color=yellow]职业[/color]、[color=yellow]命盘[/color]等…
In addition to equipment and skills, you also need to pay attention to other systems that can help you grow. Such as Job, Talent, etc...
[color=yellow]职业[/color]是学习技能的前置条件，它决定了你可以使用技能的类型。[color=yellow]职业系数[/color]也影响着技能的释放效果。在商会等地方，你可以购买到[color=yellow]转职书[/color]，你可以选择喜欢的职业路线去发展。

Job is a prerequisite for learning skills. It determines the type of skills you can use. The profession coefficient also affects the release effect of skills. In places like the Chamber of Commerce, you can buy job transfer books. You can choose your favorite career path to develop.
每个角色有用不同的[color=yellow]命格[/color]。命格决定了角色独特的成长属性，在命盘中，命格的类型也决定了[color=yellow]命盘槽[/color]类型。你可以将获得的[color=yellow]命石[/color]嵌入命盘同种类型的槽位中，这将为角色提供自由发挥的属性选择路线与成长路线。

Each character has a different Talent. Talent determines the unique growth attributes of the character. In the Talent, the type of Talent also determines the type of Talent slot. You can embed the obtained fate stones into the slots of the same type in the Talent, which will provide the character with an attribute selection route and growth route for free play.
听上去有些复杂，不过我会仔细研究学习。
It sounds a bit complicated, but I will study and learn it carefully.
好的，现在请将通关下一个战斗副本联军讨董为目标吧！
OK, now let's aim to clear the next battle instance 2!
看来你已经轻车熟路了。
It seems that you are already familiar with it.
我们什么时候可以回去了？背包已经要装不下了，我又舍不得销毁。这些装备随便一件拿回主位面卖的话，至少都能卖个几千上万元！想想都有些迫不及待了。

When can we go back? The backpack is almost full and I am reluctant to destroy it. Any of these equipments can be sold for at least several thousand to tens of thousands of yuan if taken back to the main plane! Just thinking about it makes me impatient.
没问题，我们随时可以回去。但是你想重开古玩店的话，还缺少一个[color=yellow]店员[/color]。不妨在这里带一个回去？例如[color=yellow]貂蝉[/color]？
No problem, we can go back at any time. But if you want to reopen the antique shop, you still lack a clerk. Why not bring one back here? For example, Diao Chan?
[color=lightgreen]带异位面的角色回去打工[/color]？这是个疯狂的想法。
Taking characters from different planes back to work? This is a crazy idea.
你爷爷以前也这么干过，这没有什么问题。据我所知，貂蝉的[color=lightgreen]商业能力[/color]出众，很适合[color=yellow]任职古玩店的店员[/color]。你需要先前往[color=lightblue]酒馆招募到她[/color]，然后再[color=lightblue]返回主位面的古玩店[/color]。

Your grandfather has done this before. There is no problem. As far as I know, Diao Chan has outstanding business ability and is very suitable for being a clerk in an antique shop. You need to go to the tavern to recruit her first, and then return to the antique shop in the main plane.
You can return to the antique shop.
作为开业准备，你需要完成[color=yellow]两件事[/color]！第一，将背包中的[color=yellow]装备[/color]上架到古玩店的货架上。你可以[color=lightblue]手动选择[/color]，也可以一次性[color=lightblue]批量上架[/color]。

As preparation for opening, you need to complete two things! First, put the equipment in your backpack on the shelves of the antique shop. You can choose manually or put them on the shelves in batches at one time.
第二，将[color=yellow]貂蝉姐姐设置为店员[/color]。这样你不在的时候，她就能自动帮你出售货架上的货物了。
Second, set Sister Diao Chan as a clerk. In this way, when you are away, she can automatically help you sell the goods on the shelves.
谁能想到一个古玩店的店员居然是四大美女之一的貂蝉。这是赚翻的节奏！
Who would have thought that a clerk in an antique shop is actually Diao Chan, one of the four beauties. This is a rhythm of making a fortune!
每个角色都有她擅长的[color=yellow]能力[/color]。合理安排在不同的[color=yellow]职位[/color]能取得更好的收益。而貂蝉擅长的就是[color=lightgreen]商业[/color]技能。她销售古玩店商品的速度，将比其他角色快很多！现在就试试吧！

Each character has her own ability. Reasonable arrangement in different positions can achieve better results. And what Diao Chan is good at is business skills. The speed at which she sells antique shop goods will be much faster than other characters! Try it now!
点击此处开启[color=yellow]经营管理[/color]
Click here to open business management.
很好！接下来交给貂蝉就行了。这里需要你注意的是，店员只能销售货架上装备，如果货架空了，你就需要[color=yellow]及时进行补货[/color]。
Very good! Just leave it to Diao Chan next. Here you need to note that clerks can only sell equipment on the shelves. If the shelves are empty, you need to replenish in time.
除此之外，你需要注意店铺管理，例如[color=yellow]设施[/color]的购买、店铺的[color=yellow]扩建[/color]、其他职员[color=yellow]任命[/color]等。相信这难不到你。
In addition, you need to pay attention to store management, such as purchasing facilities, expanding the store, appointing other staff, etc. I believe this is not difficult for you.
我得去赶快再去位面进点货才行！第一个目标：[color=lightgreen]赚到十万块[/color]，并且[color=yellow]成立一家公司[/color]。
I have to go to the plane quickly and restock! The first goal: earn one hundred thousand cash and establish a company.
成立公司？我以为你赚钱是为了享受呢。
Establish a company? I thought you made money for enjoyment.
你和老爷子的目光似乎短浅了。那么多世界等待着我去探索与征服。光凭我一个人的能力，始终是有限的。只有成立[color=yellow]资本集团[/color]，以企业的形式[color=lightgreen]研究科技[/color]、[color=lightgreen]培养势力[/color]。现实世界也必须是我的天下。

Your and grandpa's vision seems short-sighted. So many worlds are waiting for me to explore and conquer. With only my own ability, it is always limited. Only by establishing a capital group and researching technology and cultivating power in the form of an enterprise. The real world must also be mine.
（佩服的神情）期待看到你的成就！
(Admiring look) Looking forward to seeing your achievements!
公司成立啦！以后赚到得钱，都会用作公司发展与壮大！
The company has been established! In the future, all the money earned will be used for the development and growth of the company!
公司界面解锁了，你可以在此了解公司的当前的情况。但就目前而言，只是一个空壳企业，你需要拥有一个可运作的[color=yellow]建造局[/color]，才能建设公司旗下的[color=lightgreen]功能建筑[/color]。

The company interface has been unlocked. You can understand the current situation of the company here. But for now, it is just a shell company. You need to have an Builder to build functional buildings under the company.
你果然什么都知道。我早有打算。听说古玩店附近有一块土地上，有[color=yellow]一间濒临破产的建造局[/color]。只用很低的价格，就能[color=lightgreen]通过地产中介收购它[/color]。

As expected, you know everything. I had planned it long ago. I heard that on a piece of land near the antique shop, there is a Builder on the verge of bankruptcy. It can be acquired through a real estate agent at a very low price.
那你还得继续攒钱才行。
Then you still have to continue to save money.
是的，天命打工人。继续出发吧！我们试着在东汉三国位面开始新阶段的进货之旅！
Yes, a fated worker. Let's continue to set off! Let's start a new stage of restocking journey in the plane of the Eastern Han and Three Kingdoms!
It seems that a new city has been discovered!

这是[color=yellow]势力据点[/color]。每个位面都有不同的[color=yellow]势力[/color]。像三国位面中，拥有熟知的[color=lightblue]魏国[/color]、[color=lightblue]蜀国[/color]、[color=lightblue]吴国[/color]，每个势力都拥有独特的[color=lightblue]角色[/color]、[color=lightblue]技能[/color]、以及[color=lightblue]宝库[/color]。但这些需要你达到一定的[color=yellow]声望[/color]条件，并消耗[color=yellow]势力贡献[/color]才能获得。

This is a Force stronghold. Every plane has different Force. In the plane of the Three Kingdoms, there are the familiar Wei State, Shu State, and Wu State. Each power has unique characters, skills, and treasuries. But these require you to reach a certain reputation condition and consume power contributions to obtain them.
你可以通过完成[color=yellow]势力任务[/color]来获得[color=lightblue]声望[/color]与[color=lightgreen]贡献[/color]。势力任务会[color=yellow]定期刷新[/color]，在后期也可以通过科技道具进行刷新。
You can obtain reputation and contribution by completing Force tasks. Power tasks will be refreshed regularly and can also be refreshed by technological items in the later stage.
看来可以学到新的技能了，也会有稀有的宝物！
It seems that new skills can be learned and there will also be rare treasures!
没错。你可以去魏国[color=yellow]许昌[/color]先看看。后续还会解锁更多的势力。选择一个你喜欢的[color=lightblue]势力任务[/color]完成它吧！
That's right. You can go to Xuchang in the Wei State first to take a look. More powers will be unlocked later. Choose a power task you like and complete it!
差不多该回去了。尽早开始公司的发展才是当务之急。
It's almost time to go back. Starting the company's development as soon as possible is the top priority.
Have you saved enough money to acquire the Builder?
回去看看就知道了。如果不够的话，就[color=lightblue]多任命店员[/color]，[color=lightgreen]加快销售能力[/color]。
Go back and see. If it's not enough, appoint more clerks and speed up sales ability.
如果钱够了的话，前往[color=yellow]地产中介[/color]进行收购吧！
If you have enough money, go to the real estate agent to acquire it!
I will guide you in the operation.
点击此处打开[color=yellow]土地买卖[/color]界面
Click here to open the land trading interface.
点击此处选择[color=yellow]建造局地块[/color]
Click here to select the Builder plot.
点击此处[color=yellow]购买土地[/color]（如果现金不足就晚些时候再来）
Click here to purchase land (come back later if there is insufficient cash).
你拥有了古玩店之外的第一个功能建筑。[color=yellow]建造局[/color]负责[color=lightblue]建造建筑物[/color]。
You have the first functional building other than the antique shop. The Builder is responsible for building buildings.
但是建造建筑的前提是需要拥有[color=yellow]空闲的土地[/color]。又要攒钱买地才行了。
But the prerequisite for building a building is to have vacant land. You have to save money to buy land again.
你可以先买一块最偏远、便宜的土地，[color=yellow]建造一所研究所[/color]。研究所是公司发展的与战力提升的核心建筑。你拥有它之后，就能真实的感受到现金的作用了。

You can buy a piece of the most remote and cheap land first and build a research institute. The research institute is the core building for company development and combat power improvement. After you have it, you can truly feel the role of cash.
确实，前面一直在花钱，并没有任何反馈与收益。我快要坚持不下去了T.T
Indeed, I have been spending money all the time before and there is no feedback or income. I can't hold on anymore. T.T
哎。你爷爷还有一些留在我这里的[color=lightgreen]现金[/color]。这些钱这足够你购买到一块便宜的土地，并修建一所研究所。现在就拿去吧！似乎[color=yellow]城市右下角的土地是最便宜[/color]的。为了帮助你快速起步，只有这一次，后面的钱都需要你自己去挣了。

Alas. Your grandfather still has some cash left with me. This money is enough for you to buy a cheap piece of land and build a research institute. Take it now! It seems that the land in the lower right corner of the city is the cheapest. To help you get started quickly, this is only once. You need to earn the money later by yourself.
你已经成功开始了[color=lightblue]研究所[/color]的建造！但建造的过程[color=yellow]需要时间[/color]，这取决于你建造局的[color=yellow]建造速度[/color]。
You have successfully started the construction of the research institute! But the construction process takes time, which depends on the construction speed of your Builder.
看来需要到位面招募更多角色才行！
It seems that more characters need to be recruited in the plane!
和古玩店一样，你需要[color=yellow]任命建造师[/color]，建造任务才会进行。你可以暂时安排[color=yellow]邢道荣[/color]去，他勉强有些[color=lightblue]建造能力[/color]。[color=lightblue]建造能力[/color]越强，[color=lightblue]建造速度越快[/color]！

Like the antique shop, you need to appoint a constructor. Only then will the construction task proceed. You can temporarily arrange Xing Daorong to go. He barely has some construction ability. The stronger the construction ability, the faster the construction speed!
等待建造完成后，城市中就会出现[color=yellow]研究所[/color]地点了。等你达到了研究所之后，我们再进行下一步。
After the construction is completed, the location of the research institute will appear in the city. After you reach the research institute, we will take the next step.
研究所终于建成了！可以开始着手[color=yellow]研究科技[/color]了！
The research institute has finally been built! You can start researching technology!
是的，这里需要给你讲解。研究所有不同的科技方向，包括[color=yellow]基础科技树[/color]、[color=yellow]强化科技树[/color]等。研究科技需要得力的[color=lightblue]研究能力[/color]角色任职研究员，也需要[color=lightgreen]现金[/color]的支持，越是后期的科技，需要的现金越多。

Yes, here I need to explain to you. The research institute has different technological directions, including basic technology tree, enhanced technology tree, etc. Researching technology requires capable characters with research ability to serve as researchers, and also needs the support of cash. The later the technology, the more cash is needed.
科技好像是[color=yellow]逐步解锁[/color]的，可以先尝试研究一些简单的方向。
Technology seems to be unlocked step by step. You can try to research some simple directions first.
就从能加快古玩店[color=lightblue]销售能力科技[/color]开始吧，这将提高你赚钱的速度。
Start with the technology that can speed up the sell ability of the antique shop. This will increase your speed of making money.
点击此处打开[color=yellow]科技树[/color]界面
Click here to open the technology tree interface.
点击此处选择[color=yellow]科技[/color]开始研究
Click here to select technology and start researching.
你现在已经完全掌握了位面的探索与公司的发展了。
You have now fully mastered the exploration of planes and the development of the company.
位面的探索就是[color=yellow]不断的战斗[/color]，[color=yellow]解锁新的地点[/color]，刷到[color=yellow]更好的装备[/color]，招募[color=yellow]更多的角色[/color]，学习[color=yellow]更强的技能[/color]。
The exploration of planes is continuous battles, unlocking new locations, obtaining better equipment, recruiting more characters, and learning stronger skills.
公司的发展就是通过[color=yellow]科技树的研究[/color]，解锁更多的功能，购买[color=yellow]更多的土地[/color]，建造[color=yellow]更多的不同功能的建筑[/color]，也同时[color=yellow]通过科研提升战斗与探索位面的能力[/color]。

The development of the company is through the research of the technology tree, unlocking more functions, purchasing more land, building more buildings with different functions, and also improving the combat and exploration ability of planes through scientific research at the same time.
后续的过程，我就不啰嗦了。主人，请自行探索。在你完全[color=yellow]通关东汉三国位面的基础难度[/color]后，我将为你打开真正的[color=yellow]《诸天宝录》[/color]！

For the subsequent process, I won't be long-winded. Master, please explore on your own. After you completely clear the basic difficulty of the Eastern Han and Three Kingdoms plane, I will open the real "Multiverse book" for you!
你完成了三国位面的基础难度。
You have completed the basic difficulty of the Three Kingdoms plane.
我可以去其他[color=yellow]新的位面[/color]了吗？
Can I go to other new planes?
是的。在完成了每个位面的[color=lightgreen]基础难度[/color]之后，就可以再[color=yellow]《诸天宝录》[/color]的[color=yellow]“诸天谱”[/color]中[color=lightblue]解锁新的位面[/color]了。（或者直接在[color=yellow]穿越系统[/color]中解锁）
Yes. After completing the basic difficulty of each plane, you can unlock new planes in the "Plane" of the "Multiverse book".
你也可以[color=lightgreen]继续挑战原位面更高的难度[/color]，新难度下的位面不会有大的变化。但是敌人会变得更强，相应的，获得的收益也会增加。

You can also continue to challenge a higher difficulty of the original plane. There will be no major changes in the plane under the new difficulty. But the enemies will become stronger, and correspondingly, the obtained benefits will also increase.

如果通关了更高难度的位面，就能在《诸天宝录》中获得被称为[color=yellow]“星魂”[/color]神秘物质。它作为宝录真正的能量，可以帮助你[color=lightgreen]重塑肉身[/color]、[color=lightgreen]逆天改命[/color]，也可以用它在[color=yellow]“万天宝库”[/color]中兑换[color=lightblue]诸天至宝[/color]！

If you clear a higher difficulty plane, you can obtain a mysterious substance called "Star" in the "Multiverse book". As the real energy of the treasure record, it can help you reshape your body and change your fate against the heavens. You can also use it to exchange for "treasures" in the "Treasure House of All Heavens"!
重塑肉身、逆天改命、诸天至宝，这每一个听起来都好牛逼。[color=yellow]系统流[/color]啊…这我熟悉…
Reshaping the body, changing fate against the heavens, and treasures of all heavens. Each of these sounds awesome. System flow... I am familiar with this...
之前是为了引导你熟悉一切，所以我说的有点多了。但这[color=lightgreen]不是一个有着啰嗦剧情的故事[/color]，这只是[color=yellow]一个简单无脑的刷宝之旅[/color]。后面的旅程，还要请你[color=yellow]自行探索[/color]我会在《诸天宝录》中一直陪伴你！

Before, it was to guide you to be familiar with everything, so I talked a bit too much. But this is not a story with long-winded plots. This is just a simple and mindless treasure hunting journey. For the subsequent journey, please explore on your own. I will always accompany you in the "Multiverse book".
The "Multiverse book" has been completely unlocked!
请按照指引收购建造局地块
Please follow the guidance to acquire the Builder plot.
这座建造局破败不堪，但是还在勉强运作。待我日后有钱了，一定将它买下来！
This Builder is dilapidated but still barely operating. When I have money in the future, I will definitely buy it!
还不是时候，还是[color=yellow]先完成当前的主线任务[/color]吧！
It's not the time yet. It's better to complete the current main task first!
没有[color=yellow]店员[/color]古玩店无法开业！到东汉三国位面的[color=lightblue]洛阳酒馆[/color]招募[color=yellow]貂蝉[/color]后，再来吧！
Without a clerk, the antique shop cannot open! After recruiting Diao Chan at the Luoyang tavern in the Eastern Han and Three Kingdoms plane, come back again!
点击此处进入[color=yellow]势力城市[/color]。[color=lightgreen]势力任务已解锁[/color]！
Click here to enter the force city. The power task has been unlocked!
